data.prayer: Father, put your Bible in the hands of the 1,260,667, who are far from you and live in this place.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your Word. I seek you with all my heart; do not let me stray from your commands.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Limpopo, South Africa
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Limpopo to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 4 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every one of the 1,155,050 ordinary believers here to care for others, like a shepherd cares for his sheep.
God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 1,155,050 believers in Limpopo, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.

data.prayer: Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Limpopo, South Africa a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Limpopo, South Africa.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.prayer: Father, reveal your kingdom to those with a childlike heart in the state of Limpopo.
data.verse: At that time, Jesus answered, “I thank you, Father, Lord of heaven and earth, that you hid these things from the wise and understanding, and revealed them to infants. Yes, Father, for so it was well-pleasing in your sight.

location.name: Limpopo
location.cities_list: Polokwane, Phalaborwa, Mokopane, Warmbaths, Louis Trichardt
location.cities_list_w_pop: Polokwane (123,749), Phalaborwa (109,468), Mokopane (101,090), Warmbaths (90,210), Louis Trichardt (86,854)
